Kandarāyana：A brahmin．

He visited Mahā Kaccāna at the Gundavana near Madhurā and accused him of not paying due respect to elderly brahmins，but when Mahā Kaccāna preached to him he expressed delight and offered himself as the Thera’s disciple．v．l．Kundarāyana．

A．i．67f．
